The one I ordered for her was so nice, I decided to get myself one as well... next thing I know 2 other daughters also wanted one... then my mother... I gotta warn you, they seem to be addictive! No big deal, but after a couple of months of wear, the seam on one has separated and the other is definitely weakening.  Still, it served its purpose for a very reasonable price and still looks great as long as the seams aren't showing.
